mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mount Vernon.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: American Stereoscopic Company
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the east front of the Mount Vernon Mansion photographed from the northeast lawn. Mounted on cream board embossed with 'Langenheim.' The title 'Mount Vernon.' is printed in red text. A small label adhered to the reverse reads: American Stereoscopic Co., Langenheim, Loyd & Co., Philadelphia. Entered according to act of Congress, in the year 1858. A handwritted note reads: Purchased Oct. 1941 from W. Floyd K____, 575 Riverside Drive, N. Y. C. $1.00 - C. C. W. [Charles C. Wall]'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
George Washington's Mount Vernon
